rich-terms-of-usage-notice.text: By signing in to Miitti App, you accept our

auth-subtitle: Nice to meet you, time to upgrade your social life?
first-auth-welcome-subtitle:
Would you next like to finish your
profile or take a tour of the app?
complete-profile-skip-notice:
Please note that you cannot access most
features until your profile is completed.
delete-account-confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your information will be permanently erased. This action cannot be undone.
input-name-disclaimer: You're unique so remember to use only your own infromation.
invalid-name-missing: Please enter your name above to proceed.
input-email-disclaimer: We never use your email for marketing without your permission!
input-birthday-disclaimer: We use this to calculate your age
invalid-birthday-missing: Please enter your birthday above to proceed.
invalid-birthday-too-young: You must be at least 18 years old to use Miitti App.
invalid-birthday-too-old: Are you sure you picked the right century?
invalid-birthday-input: Invalid birthday. Check that the formatting is correct: DD/MM/YYYY
input-gender-title: Which gender do you identify with?
input-gender-disclaimer: Your gender does not define you but with it we are able to better recommend suitable miittis for you! This will not be visible for others.
invalid-gender-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
input-languages-disclaimer: Select all that you are comfortable communicating in.
invalid-languages-missing: Please select at least one language above to proceed.
input-area-disclaimer: Select the overall area where you currently reside. Miitti App is officially available only in Finland at the moment.
invalid-area-missing: Please select at least one location above to proceed.
input-occupational-status-title: What is your current occupational status?
input-occupational-status-disclaimer: This helps us to better understand your lifestyle and recommend suitable miittis for you!
invalid-occupational-status-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
input-organization-title: Which organization are you affiliated with?
input-organization-disclaimer: This helps us to better understand your lifestyle and recommend suitable miittis for you!
invalid-organization-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
